sys_ux_client_script.name: handle_search

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_6c9513e462607110a767185df8bef40c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="">3c9513e43760711054411a7488a82513</macroponent><name>handle_search</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
    const fields = {
        searchContextConfigId: api.context.props.searchContextConfigId
    };
    const params = {
        searchFilters: api.context.props.searchFilters
    };
    
	if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_RESULTS_CONTAINER#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = true;
        
  	} else if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_COMBOBOX#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = false;
        console.log("search clicked");
        api.setState('loading', true);
        api.setState('searchTerm', event.payload.searchTerm);
  	}
	//helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-06 09:38:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>6c9513e462607110a767185df8bef40c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KS Investment Requests" source="x_557984_ks_inve_0">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="KS Investment Requests">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6c9513e462607110a767185df8bef40c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-06 09:38:02</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
